definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
think tank (committee set up to study a problem)
Juche Idea (North Korean ideology of political, economic and military independence)
Confucian thoughts/the thinking of the Confucian school
with the same idea in mind/with a common purpose

sentences.english: I. To unify your thoughts and always keep in mind the overall situation.
sentences.chinese: 统一思想，牢固树立大局意识。

sentences.english: Those two ideas must be kept distinct from one another.
sentences.chinese: 必须把那两种思想区分开。

sentences.english: This is all but the revival of Alexandrian thought.
sentences.chinese: 这是所有的，但复兴亚历山大思想。

sentences.english: The pranas are always moving, and the mind is ever-changing as well.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸总是运动的，思想也总是千变万化。

sentences.english: He always inoculates me with new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我给孩子们灌输礼貌的思想。

sentences.english: The connection can still be used, just with heightened security in mind.
sentences.chinese: 连接仍然可用，只是需要从思想上提高安全意识。

sentences.english: The main characteristic of Atwood's ecological thought lies in the anti-anthropocentrism.
sentences.chinese: 阿特伍德生态思想的主要特征是反对人类中心主义。

sentences.english: This one masquerades as real, moderate thought.
sentences.chinese: 这一个伪装为真实的，温和的思想。

sentences.english: At level seven, one would experience unconditional love and no judgmental thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 在第七级别，人就会获得自由的爱和辨证的思想。

sentences.english: The miraculous effect of medical herbs has raised some conservative eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 草药的奇效简直使一些思想保守的人瞠目结舌。

sentences.english: When people's minds aren't yet emancipated and their thinking remains rigid, curious phenomena emerge.
sentences.chinese: 思想不解放，思想僵化，很多的怪现象就产生了。

sentences.english: When people's minds aren't yet emancipated and their thinking remains rigid, curious phenomena emerge.
sentences.chinese: 思想不解放，思想僵化，很多的怪现象就产生了。

sentences.english: Outlaws of the marsh the loyalty and patriotism thought is manifests through the different character.
sentences.chinese: 《水浒传》的忠义思想是通过不同人物体现出来的。

sentences.english: And right in-between thinking and doing, I would say, there is experience.
sentences.chinese: 正处于思想和行为之间的，我会说，是经验。

sentences.english: What I perceive as a negative thought may be something natural for somebody else.
sentences.chinese: 我所理解的消极思想可能对其他人来说是自然的。

sentences.english: He also began to carry it out as soon as he took charge of FengXi warlord.
sentences.chinese: 在掌控奉系军阀统治权后，他也开始践行这一思想。

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
